content.text:
# Teen Choice Award for Choice Movie Actor – Action

The following is a list of Teen Choice Award winners and nominees for Choice Movie Actor - Action. This award was first introduced  in 2002.
2010s
{|class="wikitable"
!width="200"| Year
!width="250"| Won
!width="350"| Other
!width="150"| Ref.
|-
|align="center"|2010 Teen Choice Awards
|'Channing Tatum – G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra'
|
* Nicolas Cage – Kick-Ass
* Russell Crowe – Robin Hood
* Matt Damon – Green Zone
* Robert Downey Jr. – Sherlock Holmes
|align="center"|
|-
|align="center"|2011 Teen Choice Awards
|'Johnny Depp – The Tourist'
|
* Michael Cera – Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
* Vin Diesel – Fast Five
* Dwayne Johnson – Fast Five
* Paul Walker – Fast Five
|align="center"|
|-

|

|align="center"|2018 Teen Choice Awards
|'Robert Downey Jr. – Avengers: Infinity War as Tony Stark / Iron Man'
|
*John Boyega – Pacific Rim: Uprising as Jake Pentecost
*Henry Cavill – Justice League as Clark Kent / Superman
*Chris Evans – Avengers: Infinity War as Steve Rogers / Captain America
*Tom Holland – Avengers: Infinity War as Peter Parker / Spider-Man
*Dylan O'Brien – Maze Runner: The Death Cure as Thomas
|
|-
|align="center"|2019 Teen Choice Awards
|Robert Downey Jr. – Avengers: Endgame as Tony Stark / Iron Man
|
*John Cena – Bumblebee as Jack Burns
*Chris Evans – Avengers: Endgame as Steve Rogers / Captain America
*Chris Hemsworth – Avengers: Endgame/Men in Black: International  as Thor; Henry/Agent H
*Samuel L. Jackson – Captain Marvel as Nick Fury
*Paul Rudd – Ant-Man and the Wasp/Avengers: Endgame as Scott Lang / Ant-Man
